item.title: Taxpayers to Bailout SEIU?
item.description: Senator Bob Casey (D-PA) wants you to pay $165 billion to bail out organized crimeunions. Actually, the bill heading toward taxpayers is unlimited and could reach into the trillions: Although right now taxpayers could possibly be on the hook for $165 billion, the liability could essentially be unlimited because these pensions have to be paid out until the workers die. Remember why we took to the streets for the first Tea Party Protests in 2009?
